title.rendered: Spandan Neo – 12 Lead ECG device in a wire

content.rendered:
Spandan Neo

 The Next Gen Cardiac Care

Shop Now
Book a Free Demo
SPANDAN NEO

Real Time ECG Evaluation

Spandan Neo provides real-time heart health evaluation on smartphones, whether at home or outdoors. Serving as a primary point of care device, it offers immediate cardiac testing and results, enabling swift responses to emergencies and facilitating timely interventions.

FOR HIGH RISK INDIVIDUALS

Early Intervention

With its user-friendly three-electrode design, Spandan Neo is an ideal choice for high-risk individuals, including heart patients, those with blood pressure, and diabetes, enabling convenient regular monitoring. This aids them in staying updated with their health status, empowering them to take necessary action when required.

FAST AND ACCURATE ECG

AI Driven Interpretations

Spandan Neo provides rapid AI-driven interpretations with 99.7% accuracy. It has the highest sensitivity, capable of detecting even the slightest heart abnormalities, and delivers exceptionally clear traces. These traces can be zoomed in up to 50X for a closer examination.

CUTTING EDGE ATTRIBUTES

Robust Connectivity

Spandan Neo boasts a robust and durable design, featuring an integrated cable that eliminates connectivity issues and ensures consistent signal transfer. Additionally, Spandan Neo is moisture-resistant and environmentally friendly, further enhancing its reliability and sustainability.

Preferred By​

100+

Doctors

500+

Users

500+

Business

Know When to Use Spandan

Unclear Symptoms

Find out immediately if your symptoms need to be treated or not.

Heart Attack

Avoid additional damage following a heart attack by performing regular checks.

Arrhythmias

Recognize recurrent symptoms after being treated for an arrhythmia and prevent stroke.

Prevention

Keep your cardiac risk, whether from increasing age or a familiar predisposition, in check.

How to take ECG with Spandan

Watch Full Video
Watch Full Video

Access Medical-Grade ECG Tests on Smartphone

Spandan ECG offers advanced medical-grade ECG tests on your smartphone. Detect blockages, arrhythmias, take real-time ECG and Hyperkalemia test, and check stress and anxiety levels

  • 12 Lead ECG
  • Lead ll ECG
  • HRV
  • Hyperkalemia
  • Live Monitor

12 Lead ECG

The Spandan Portable ECG device uses no battery and derives power from the mobile it is connected to. No internet is required for our ECG app for smartphones, either.
Learn More
Sample Report

Lead II ECG

Detect and measure the rhythm of the heart. This test is primarily used to diagnose various patterns of arrhythmia.

Learn More
Sample Report

HRV

The Heart Rate Variability test interprets the variation in heart rate. It also allows you to track your stress and anxiety levels.

Learn More
Sample Report

Hyperkalemia

This test aids in the detection of hyperkalemia, a medical condition characterized by elevated levels of potassium in the blood.

Learn More
Sample Report

Live Monitor

Monitor your heart health in real-time. Gain valuable information about the rhythm, rate, and overall cardiac health of your heart.

Learn More

Detects 20+ Cardiac Abnormalities

User Reviews and Testimonials

Sudarshana Borah
Found it very useful and as I live away from my parents and parents in law, this machine helps me to stay a little assured about their health. It alerts about their heart condition and helps me to figure out when to consult a doctor. . Moreover it's very easy to use.
Dr. Dipali Solanki
Its wonderful device..i really love that device…its very helpfull….on my clinical basis it too much helpful for me…and easy to carry any where…and all sunflox group are very helpful and and its easy to understand every 1…that device demo is too good…easy to understand…i really recommended every 1…nd specially for clinics..thank u sunflox…its really greatful..
Suneet Sardana
Awesome User Interface of the App, which is easy to use while operating the small Pocket Size Spandan ECG device. Best for Live Heart Rate Monitoring and 12 Lead ECG Test Of Heart. Many Heart Attacks can be stopped by monitoring symptoms before any problem. This Device is very helpful for me. As I m using it to do ECG of Patients in Emergency or which I think that their condition is not ok, so pocket size Spandan ECG is helpful.
Dr. Suhas Joshi
I have used this ecg machine for over 100 patients. The reports are credible. Those diagnosed by the ecg as abnormal are followed up by me with 2 D echo and stress test and moostly found correct. Most of the tests done were for charity.
Prateek Jain
Very easy to operate and the customer care also helped and taught in easy steps how to use the device. Have been using the same at my clinical establishment and found it to be accurate and the free reporting service is an added advantage.

Frequently Asked Questions

I am looking for an ECG device for home use for my parents. Is Spandan Neo suitable?

Sunfox’s Spandan Neo is designed for non-experts, making it ideal for ECG at-home monitoring. It’s easy to use and helps monitor parents’ heart health on smartphones. The Spandan ECG device app guides users through the process of taking ECG tests.

How is it different from Sunfox’s Spandan Legacy and Spandan Pro?

Sunfox’s Spandan Pro is designed for doctors, featuring 10 leads that enable quick ECG readings. Spandan Neo, tailored for non-experts, is ideal for home monitoring. And, Spandan Legacy, our first flagship product is suitable for both.

I am not from a medical background. How will I read Spandan’s ECG Report?

You can easily read Spandan’s ECG reports even if you’re not from a medical background. The interpretation is AI-generated, and the reports are designed to be easily understandable. You can also share your reports with our experts.

I have never taken an ECG. How will I use this ECG device?

You can easily take ECG from Spandan Neo even if you are not experienced. You will receive a live virtual demo from our experts on how to use the device, and you will be guided through the ECG process by a 3D on-screen guide on the Spandan ECG app.

Can I use Spandan Neo while traveling abroad?

Yes, Spandan Neo is well-suited for travel use. Being lightweight, portable, and user-friendly, you can easily carry it wherever needed. As it requires no battery or internet to function, it is also suitable for use in remote or no-internet areas.

Take the First Step Towards a Healthy Heart

*Spandan is currently available for Android Users only.
